title: Land for Sale in Wattala
details: This 214 perch land is centrally located and has easy access to all major roads and junctions. With a 100+ foot main road frontage and accessibility for any container trucks as it has a 60+ foot wide road, most commercial ventures including warehousing or a container yard are just a few of the potential options. The property sits in close proximity to the Fertilization Corporation and is 1.3km from the main Negombo road. Available for sale.
